transcript:
he thought. "Yes, I did not know any- thing, anything at all till now. But where am I?" 
He listened and heard the sound of approach- ing horses, and voices speaking French. He opened his eyes. Above him again was the same lofty sky with clouds that had risen and were floating still higher, and between them gleamed blue infinity. He did not turn his head and did not see those who, judging by the sound of hoofs and voices, had ridden up and stopped near him. 
It was Napoleon accompanied by
